about_the_game:
After discovering a major clue concerning the double homicide in Willowdale Nature Reserve, Sara is mysteriously convicted on false bribery charges that brings the investigation to a grinding halt. Fortunately, an old friend investigating a related case just so happens to be around the corner…

Will they be able to team up to solve these mysteries?

Will they find out who planted the false evidence against Sara?

Will they discover the true conspiracy at hand?

“The Walsingham Files” features:

  • A gripping and suspenseful storyline
  • Beautiful orchestral soundtrack
  • Charming retro graphics art style
  • Difficult detective work needing to be done!

Only you can find out by grabbing your favourite pen and detective’s pad, getting your thinking cap on and pressing on with the case in “The Walsingham Files: Chapter 2”.

content_descriptors.notes: Given the criminal investigation nature of this detective series, strong subjects like homicide and sexual assault are mentioned. There is also a pixel-graphic depiction of crime scenes. Strong language and profanity are frequently used. Supernatural subjects are discussed.

After discovering a major clue concerning the double homicide in Willowdale Nature Reserve, Sara is mysteriously convicted on false bribery charges that brings the investigation to a grinding halt. Fortunately, an old friend investigating a related case just so happens to be around the corner…

Only you can find out by grabbing your favourite pen and detective’s pad, getting your thinking cap on and pressing on with the case in “The Walsingham Files: Chapter 2”.

Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1 gh
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
